name: Save Robot
description:
STORY

Your spaceship, where you do scientific research, as usual, has been attacked by aliens. Your other friends are dead and your robot friend is left, but there is a problem.

Aliens have trapped your robot friend and he needs your help to get out of there!

Thanks for playing.

CREDITS

3D Art:  MSU, Ciathyza (Asset  Store), Emirhan Kurşun

Sound Effects: MSU

Music: julius_galla (freesound.org), lharman94 (freesound.org)

Level Design: Emirhan Kurşun

Scripts: MSU, Emirhan Kurşun

Animations: MSU, Emirhan Kurşun

Post Processing: Emirhan Kurşun

Story: Emirhan Kurşun
